name: Slime & goblins
description:
You are a green slime living in your cozy pit, which was attacked by evil goblins! The only thing left for you is to jump on their heads. Collect useful and not so useful bonuses, keep track of the remaining stamina, score as many points as possible and have fun!

How to play?

  • Use A & D to move
  • Jump on goblins' heads to jump on their heads even longer!
  • Try to fall to the ground as little as possible, otherwise you will waste stamina!

Our team:

  • Sea breeze(Programming, idea)
  • Yarice(Sprites)
  • $gxdd$(Music)
